Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2015 11:38AM - edited Dec 28, 2015 11:39AM by fancemom Before you worry any further- Try massaging it (towards the nipple, essentially hand expressing milk) in a hot shower. Hard painful lumps around the nipple area while breastfeeding are almost always collected breastmilk that just needs to be squeezed out. I've gotten them so many times (I've breastfed 5 babies).
